name: Ant Assault
description:
Ant Assault is a first-person shooter set in a world of bipedal ants where you play as an ant soldier fighting for control of an enemy colony, shooting or goo-ing enemy ants while walking up surfaces to gain tactical advantages.

The fire ant nation has stolen your colony's larvae to be made as slaves. Chamber by chamber you must invade their colony to rescue your young and secure the future of your colony!

Programmers

Benjamin Wharton

Nik Rosser

Lachlan McCrohon

Artists

Aaron Robinson

Daniel Holloway

Felix Grmek

Jack Williams

Michael Collins-Clarke

Designers
